doc.field: New York University Archives Collection of Minutes
New York University Archives Collection of Minutes

The New York University Archives Collection of Minutes was created by the University Archives to group together minutes documenting meetings of various university entities. Groups represented in this collection include the University Senate; university officers; the medical, dental, education, professional, and engineering schools; the College of Arts and Sciences; and the Student Council. Material dates from 1832 to 2016.

The New York University Archives Collection of Minutes was created by the University Archives to group together minutes documenting meetings of various university entities. Groups represented in this collection include the University Senate; university officers; the medical, dental, education, professional, and engineering schools; the College of Arts and Sciences; and the Student Council. Material dates from 1832 to 2016.

The New York University Archives Collection of Minutes consists of minutes documenting meetings of various university entities, from the University Senate to departmental or school faculty minutes to the minutes of the Student Council. Material dates from 1832 to 2016.
The New York University Archives Collection of Minutes was created by the University Archives to group together minutes documenting meetings of various university entities.

Some materials in this collection were transferred from various New York University departments between 1981 and 2009. No information was recorded about the acquisition of the other materials in this collection. The accession numbers associated with these transfers include 09.016, 81.033, 91.003, and 91.004.
